pages.text: Scattered around the world you have discovered numerous geodes, which produce not only colored gems, but also valuable resources.

pages.title: Auto-Harvesting
pages.text: The $(l:magic/crystal_apothecary)Crystal Apothecary$() is able to harvest $(item)Crystals$() automatically - even if you are not near those geodes at all!

pages.title: Moving Budding Blocks
pages.text: Tools enchanted with $(l:enchantments/resonance)Resonance$() are able to harvest Budding Blocks.
